content: to https //www youtube com/watch v=d8rdkitz8r8 by the sweater collective body rounds 1-5 knit round 6-8 *k1 p1* repeat * to * until the end of the round cast off in k1 p1 pattern on the last round cut yarn and fasten_off sleeves with us 6 4mm dpns place the sts for one sleeve back on the needles starting at the bottom of the armhole pick up and knit 1 underarm st place a bor m rounds 1-5 knit rounds 6-8 *k1 p1* repeat * to * until the end of the round cast off in k1 p1 pattern on the last round cut yarn and fasten_off repeat for the other sleeve weave in all ends you can check out this video on youtube to see how i embroidered the little tree on the sweater https //www youtube com/shorts/v7nqyurztx8 finishing if this is an ornament loop a piece of yarn through the top of the collar and tie a knot so it can hang from the tree or attach the sweater to a piece of twine with a clothes pin to make a cute garland to hang on a bookshelf or mantle feel free to sell your mini jumpers in small quantities no wholesale orders and please give credit to my shop fibers and pines each time my design is used please do not sell recreate give away or copy my pattern © 2025 fibers and pines all rights reserved if you need help at any time please email me at hello@fibersandpines com and i will respond as quickly as i can i would love to see your finished mini jumper so please tag me on instagram @fibersandpines and use the hashtag #minijumper thank you so much for choosing my pattern ~ jacey
